Kevin Munc

Do you like your weekday metal music a little early?

26 Jun 2018

The Alrosa Villa is a metal-friendly venue in Columbus, Ohio. Tonight I’m back here seeing The Iron Maidens. Once again, the line up includes other local tribute bands, and the Motörhead tribute Orgasmatron just finished.

What I find interesting, and might like to see become a trend, is that this is an early show. For a weekday, that’s nice (and it’s still metal, dammit).
